name: Lifesource
description:
You are a flame. Fire is light, and life. 

But all that glistens is not fire. 

Made for the GameDev.tv 2021 game jam. 

First jam try, we're all (3 of us) pretty new =)

Move with A/D (or left and rigth) and jump with space.

Any damage will scatter your flame, and make your light weaker. But any flames you pick up will make you stronger. 

Oh, did we mention the oxygen that feeds your flame is running out, and you're on a timer?

We took the "glistening" and "glimmering" ideas to heart... maybe a bit too much =)

Hints:

The oxygen bar is your health, it will slowly decrease over time, and taking damage from monsters and traps will also deplete it.

Picking up red flames will restore some of your health and stoke your flame, and you can light torches to help the environment stay lit.

All elements in the level glisten in the dark... bou you will have to get close to see what they are. Too close, sometimes.
